page.title: 16POLITICS in RHAYADER
page.content: There are no{central government {offices,local government}being admin- istered from Llandrindod Wells.A small sub-office exists to deal with local council tenants' rent,repairs etc. and administers the Community Centre and Caravan Park. Branches of the main {political parties}are active in the town, Councillors on the{Local and {District Councils}tending to be apolitical being elected on a personal rather than political vote. The{mayor}for the local Rhayader/ Cwmdeuddwr Council is elected annually in May. There was a{bye-election}this year on July 4th caused by the death of Mr.Tom Hooson,the 1st Conservative M.P.for the Brecon and Radnor Constit- uency for 40years.Prominent members of all political parties electioneered in the area with Mr.Richard Livesey Liberal/S.D.P.being elected M.P.
